description:
Keroro goes to find his lost comrades, and winds up finding one of them: Tamama, the ultra-polite, who is living with a girl named Momoka.  They both have a terrible temper, though...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Garance et Tamama / Garance est amoureuse
Momoka and Tamama Shotsugeki! de Arimasu / Momoka and Tamama Hinata-ke Jouriku de Arimasu
桃華 & タママ出撃! であります / 桃華 & タママ日向家上陸 であります
